title: Men Y2k Skater Jeans Vintage Low Rise Baggy Straight Leg Jeans Casual Stretch Loose Fit Denim Pants Streetwear
description: Material: Our low waist jeans are made of 90% cotton and 10% polyester, which have a little stretchy and are breathable and comfortable to wear.

Design: These low waisted jeans have baggy straight legs, full length and multiple pockets design. The classic denim look gets a modern twist with our stylish jeans that are both comfortable and on-trend.
Occasions: Our long pants are ideal for all seasons, and suitable for parties, holidays, streetwear, skate, dance, outdoor sports, casual daily wear, etc.
Match: These jeans are easy to pair with any top or shoes. Dress them up with a blouse for a professional feel, or keep it casual with a t-shirt and sneakers.
Size: S/M/L/XL/XXL. Please refer to the size chart before ordering.
1. Due to manual measurement, there may be an error of 1-2 cm in size.
2. Depending on the computer monitor used, colors may differ from actual colors.
